titleStmt.title: Dorchester, Dorset History Centre, Bridport Borough Archive G/1

msItem.title: ‘Old Doom Book.’ Magna carta with statutes; register of writs; Bridport documents; Natura brevium; tracts

history.provenance: Provenance: Laurence family (s. XIV); Bridport, Corporation MS 2644.

listBibl.bibl: Bibliography: HMC, Sixth Report, App., p. 475; Thomas Wainwright, The Bridport Records and Ancient Manuscripts, 1900, pp. 1–2; Martin Weinbaum, ‘Observations on the Old Doom Book of Bridport’, EHR vol. 84, no. 331 (Apr. 1969), pp. 297–303; MMBL, II, pp. 169–73.

body.p:
Dorchester, Dorset History Centre
Bridport Borough Archive G/1. ‘Old Doom Book.’ Magna carta with statutes; register of writs; Bridport documents; Natura brevium; tracts. 260 ff. 188 x 115 mm. Text block c. 140 x 95 mm. Written soon after 1326.
Provenance: Laurence family (s. XIV); Bridport, Corporation MS 2644.
Bibliography: HMC, Sixth Report, App., p. 475; Thomas Wainwright, The Bridport Records and Ancient Manuscripts, 1900, pp. 1–2; Martin Weinbaum, ‘Observations on the Old Doom Book of Bridport’, EHR vol. 84, no. 331 (Apr. 1969), pp. 297–303; MMBL, II, pp. 169–73.
